name: Coronation of Charles XV of Sweden
obverse: Busts of Charles XV and his wife Louise of the Netherlands facing right.
obverse_inscriptions: CAROLUS XV ET LUDOVICA REX ET REGINA SVEC. NORVEG. GOTH. ET VAND.
reverse: Charles XV facing right towards a female figure who is clasping his right hand. Behind the woman is a shield with the three Swedish crowns and a lion laying down.
reverse_inscriptions: IN MEMOR. FESTI CORONAT. DIE III MAII MDCCCLX CELEBRATI ORDD. REGNI SVEC. C. F.
description: Charles XV's coronation occurred on May 3, 1860 in Stockholm, Sweden.
